main event: A commercial air carrier flight observed unknown bright objects moving at high speed near Bermuda on 8 October 1960.
interesting points: The objects were first seen visually by the pilot and copilot at approximately 2140 hours,The objects were described as round and very bright,The objects maneuvered in ways inconsistent with known aircraft,The sighting lasted approximately 10 to 15 minutes before the objects disappeared,Attempts to contact the objects by radio were unsuccessful.
witness description: pilot and copilot of a commercial air carrier flight
